Product is as perfect as original equipment mirror.Direct fit: Ram towing mirror lower glass replacement allows driver to more easily see vehicles and other dangers behind him and make it easier to observe areas behind and at the sides of the vehicleLeft Pass Convex Lower Mirror Glass is an easy and low cost way of increasing security and safety in the workplace or the home. They help deter theft and eliminate the dangers of blind spots and dangerous intersections.

How to place a convex mirror on a side view mirror? Sit in the driver seat with the window rolled down. Adjust your side mirror so you can see correctly. Hold the convex mirror against your side mirror and move it around until you have achieved the optimal location; make a note of that location. The Advantages of Convex Mirrors Convex side view mirrors are slightly curved and thus provide a wider angle of visual space. They help to eliminate most blind spots and let you see a bigger area than common flat glass mirrors. Thus, you are able to see much more than with regular flat mirrors. Convex mirrors are often used on bigger or longer vehicles because flat glass mirrors cannot cover enough space to see past a big car. Therefore, they are a good choice for SUVs, Caravans, Trucks, or large 4×4 vehicles. What's the best way to replace a side mirror? Start by finding your replacement mirror. There are two types of replacement mirrors—snap-on and stick-on. This will help you determine whether the backing plate behind the glass needs to come out as well.
